name: Association Slovenian Forum of Social Entrepreneurship, Social Enterprise
membership: Nwteork Social economy South east Europe - in forming
goal: We wish to serve as a platform for connection of social enterprises and those supporting institutions which have set themselves a goal to promote social entrepreneurship and thereby become a generator of sustainably oriented socio-economical changes in Slovenia. Furthermore, we intend to act as an internationally branched out and renowned centre of excellence for development and promotion of social entrepreneurship.
interests: Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise
euInitiatives: leagal framework, legislation for social economy - taxation, local partnership
